message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product. I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $875000. I'm trying to be as flexible as possible, but I need to stay within my budget.
